channel.title: Headicons glitch?
channel.description:
Before I begin, this is a repost of my old topic. The only reason I'm reposting is because I need this solved as soon as possible so I can release my server.
Hello! After I finished fixing most of the clients errors, I came up to the very last one that I know of.
The title of this thread sort of describes it. First of all, if you have just a skull and NOTHING else, then you're fine, the skull is above the HP bar as it is supposed to be. Same with a prayer headicon. But this is where the problem comes in. If you have a skull AND you turn on a headicon prayer(Smite, for example) the skull sinks into the characters head and the HP bar is in between. Here is a picture that I took so you can visually see what I'm trying to explain.
[img]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj23/FfsDied/Prayerglitch.jpg[/img]
Does anyone have ANY idea on how to fix this?
Post any ideas that YOU THINK may fix this. It doesn't have to be a dead-on answer, who knows, maybe the ideas will spark my brain for an answer :P.
Thanks in advance! -Skullator

item.title: Headicons glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

I did find Method34 in client.java, I used the Z-File searcher, but the Method34 that I found was like three lines…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2009, 06:40:10 pm[/size][hr]Ooh I found it in Client.java, it’s huge! I must have mistaken it with like method344, anyways the method is really, really long. I have no idea where to start!

I do see a lot of these though

Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(anInt963 - 22, 4, 1, 0xF89898, anInt964 - 2, true);

If I’m correct, Class30 Sub 2_1_1 controls sprites…

Can you tell me what to search for WITHIN the method? Right now it’s a ‘wild goose chase’ because the method is so long.

Read full topic

item.title: Headicons glitch?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Skullator, post:5, topic:257408”]Well obiviously… ^^

I need this fixed, I planned my server to be released like a week ago![/quote]Then why are you not looking in the client? There’s only one method34, look for it (hint: Windows GREP (if you are using Windows, that is)).

Read full topic

item.title: Headicons glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

Before I begin, this is a repost of my old topic. The only reason I’m reposting is because I need this solved as soon as possible so I can release my server.

Hello! After I finished fixing most of the clients errors, I came up to the very last one that I know of.

The title of this thread sort of describes it. First of all, if you have just a skull and NOTHING else, then you’re fine, the skull is above the HP bar as it is supposed to be. Same with a prayer headicon. But this is where the problem comes in. If you have a skull AND you turn on a headicon prayer(Smite, for example) the skull sinks into the characters head and the HP bar is in between. Here is a picture that I took so you can visually see what I’m trying to explain.

Does anyone have ANY idea on how to fix this?

Post any ideas that YOU THINK may fix this. It doesn’t have to be a dead-on answer, who knows, maybe the ideas will spark my brain for an answer :P.

Thanks in advance!
-Skullator

Read full topic
